name: CIFilterGenerator
desc: An object that creates and configures chains of individual image filters.

items.name: init?(contentsOf: URL)
items.desc: Initializes a filter generator object with the contents of a filter generator file.

items.name: func connect(Any, withKey: String?, to: Any, withKey: String)
items.desc: Adds an object to the filter chain.

items.name: func disconnectObject(Any, withKey: String, to: Any, withKey: String)
items.desc: Removes the connection between two objects in the filter chain.

items.name: var exportedKeys: [AnyHashable : Any]
items.desc: Returns an array of the exported keys.

items.name: func exportKey(String, from: Any, withName: String?)
items.desc: Exports an input or output key of an object in the filter chain.

items.name: func removeExportedKey(String)
items.desc: Removes a key that was previously exported.

items.name: func setAttributes([AnyHashable : Any], forExportedKey: String)
items.desc: Sets a dictionary of attributes for an exported key.

items.name: var classAttributes: [AnyHashable : Any]
items.desc: The class attributes associated with the filter.

items.name: func write(to: URL, atomically: Bool) -> Bool
items.desc: Archives a filter generator object to a filter generator file.

items.name: func registerFilterName(String)
items.desc: Registers the name associated with a filter chain.

items.name: func filter() -> CIFilter
items.desc: Creates a filter object based on the filter chain.
